creator: jean.winther@defra.gsi.gov.uk
text:
uname -a gives:
SunOS bsun14 5.8 Generic_117350-02 sun4u sparc SUNW,Sun-Fire-880

I have downloaded the file 'xerces-c-current.tar.gz' from the above URL to my 
PC, then used FTP in binary mode to move the file onto the Sun box. I then 
tried to extract it with the command:
gunzip < xerces-c-current.tar.gz | tar xvf -

This gives a 'tar: directory checksum error' message. Here is the full log from 
the gunzip command:
$ gunzip < xerces-c-current.tar.gz | tar xvf -
$
